title: An epistle or letter of exhortation vvritten in Latyne by Marcus Tullius Cicero, to his brother Quintus the proconsull or deputy of Asia, wherin the office of a magistrate is connyngly and wisely described. Translated into englyshe by G.G. Set furth and authorised according to the Queenes Maiesties iniunctions
author: Cicero, Marcus Tullius.
publisher: By Rouland Hall, dwelling in Golding lane at the sygne of the three arrowes,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
